metadata.title: CVE-2021-45833 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability exists in HDF5 1.13.1-1 via the H5D__create_chunk_file_map_hyper function in /hdf5/src/H5Dchunk.c, which causes a Denial of Service (context-dependent).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
paraview package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
